name: Forest of the Elements
description:
Made for the GM48 gamejam in 48 hours in October 2015

https://gm48.net/game/95/forest-of-elements

You are faced with an a peculiar fate, it seems the elements have come together and would like to claim the forest you call home. The Forests creatures are attacking and soon behind them the elements themselves.

Be careful, or the elements will combine to create a force you'll have trouble taming!

Use your nature spell to make the environment work for you - blast the rocks and trees to make them work for you!
